title: Bug 117981 - Any item can't be selected at the first time in library outline view.
description: Description: Any item can't be selected at the first time in library outline view.
OB: When attempting to select an item in the library outline view for the first time, the selection does not register.
EB: The second time I attempt to select the label item, it can be successfully selected.
SR:
Steps to reproduce:
1. Open the library outline view.
2. Attempt to select any item for the first time.
3. Observe that the selection does not register.
4. Select the same item again for the second time and observe that it is now successfully selected.
